changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS authentication.user ( id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );

changeSet.author: Mina
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS authentication.login_attempt ( id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, success BOOLEAN DEFAULT false, created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );
